name: suboptimal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
less than optimal (= the best possible): Long-term consumer debt is often considered fiscally suboptimal. A combination of these two drugs at the same suboptimal concentrations showed a potent inhibitory activity.
not very good: I consider that her care was suboptimal in some respects. Initial assessment was often suboptimal, and key features in investigation and initial management were often lacking.
More examplesFewer examplesEach individual fitness measure may have its own optimal or suboptimal solutions.Men with suboptimal sperm counts have been known to father children.All of these are suboptimal solutions.She's got six children in four different foster care facilities, so that's suboptimal, no question.

below the highest level or standard, or not done in the best way possible: Investors are stuck in sub-optimal investments.
